code: import React from'react';import{SplitLayout,TextInput,NavButton}from'../components';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function LocationScreen(_ref){let{data,update,onNext,onBack}=_ref;const distances=[5,10,25,50,100,'Any'];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SplitLayout,{progress:94,leftTitle:"Where should we find your people?",rightContent:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{fontSize:'26px',fontWeight:'600',color:'#1a1a1a',marginBottom:'28px'},children:"Your location"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextInput,{label:"City or area",value:data.location,onChange:v=>update('location',v),placeholder:"e.g., London, UK"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:'28px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{style:{display:'block',fontSize:'14px',color:'#555',marginBottom:'14px',fontWeight:'500'},children:"Maximum distance to meet people"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',gap:'10px',flexWrap:'wrap'},children:distances.map(d=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>update('maxDistance',d),style:{padding:'12px 18px',borderRadius:'24px',border:"2px solid ".concat(data.maxDistance===d?'#1a5f5a':'#e0e0e0'),backgroundColor:data.maxDistance===d?'#1a5f5a':'#fff',color:data.maxDistance===d?'#fff':'#333',fontSize:'14px',cursor:'pointer',fontWeight:data.maxDistance===d?'500':'400'},children:d==='Any'?'Any distance':"".concat(d," miles")},d))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',alignItems:'center',marginTop:'48px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavButton,{onClick:onBack,direction:"back"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavButton,{onClick:onNext,disabled:!data.location,label:"Find my group \u2192"})]})]})});}export default LocationScreen;
